Package eg.utils

Class ScreenParams

java.lang.Object
eg.utils.ScreenParams
public class ScreenParams
extends java.lang.Object
The screen size and parameters that depend on the screen resolution.

    • scaledDimension

      public static java.awt.Dimension scaledDimension​(int unscaledWidth, int unscaledHeight)
      Returns a new Dimension which may be scaled depending on the criteria in scaledSize(int)
      Parameters:
      unscaledWidth - the width in pt
      unscaledHeight - the height in pt
      Returns:
      the Dimension

      Returns the specified font with a scaled size and type plain
      Parameters:

      unscaledSize - the original unscaled size
      Returns:
      the font

      unscaledSize - the original unscaled size
      Returns:
      the font

    • scaledSize

      public static int scaledSize​(int unscaledSize)
      Returns the size which is scaled to the screen resolution. The specified unscaledSize is the size for the resolution assumed by Java (72 dpi).
      Parameters:
      unscaledSize - the unscaled size
      Returns:
      the scaled size

    • invertedScaledSize

      public static int invertedScaledSize​(int scaledSize)
      Returns the size that is the inversion of the scaled size
      Parameters:
      scaledSize - the previously scaled
      Returns:
      the rounded inverted scaled size
      See Also:
      scaledSize(int)
